views.markdown:
*支持 iOS 11 和 12*.

自 iOS 7 以来,音量 HUD 一直很糟糕。在显示时屏蔽大部分屏幕，要求您使用按钮进行快速调整，并花费很长时间才能解除，这是操作系统中最常见但最糟糕的部分之一。但 Ultrasound 不会。

几乎在音量 HUD 的每个方面，Ultrasound 都是你应得的升级。

### 看起来和它听起来一样棒。

选择美丽的黑暗和模糊设计与您设备上的物理硬件按钮完美对齐，改变音量现在是一种愉快的体验。它的实时更新音量图标和百分比可以快速浏览更多信息。其紧凑的设计与快速流畅的动画相结合，确保它占用设备屏幕上的最小空间，同时仍然看起来华丽。有多个主题和样式，定制 Ultrasound，以完美匹配您的设置。

### 你不知道你需要的铃声和口哨。

Ultrasound is more than just a fresh coat of paint for the volume HUD. It also makes it more useful than ever. You can now quickly adjust the volume on-screen using the slider, conveniently placed next to the volume buttons. And if you need to quickly hide the volume HUD, you can simply swipe it off the screen. Want to adjust the ringer volume instead? Tap on the speaker icon and watch it turn into a bell.

### Designed for iPhone X.

For the first time ever, the volume HUD is optimized for iPhone X and higher. Ultrasound allows you to see the volume level and percentage at a glance, as you adjust it while the screen is off. It seamlessly animates in and out of OLED Mode as you wake your device, and combined with OLED's true black pixels, it looks amazing.

---

**Ultrasound is now free!** If you purchased it in the last 14 days, you're entitled to a full refund. Follow the instructions [here](https://repo.dynastic.co/refunds) to open a request.

Thanks for purchasing Ultrasound! I've been working hard to make the experience even better.

- You can now choose between two volume HUD looks, Iconic and Refined, in addition to the three colour themes.
- Perfected each of the themes to work better on more backgrounds.
- Improves how Ultrasound responds when you rotate your device.
- Refined Haptic Feedback introduced on earlier versions.
- Face ID will no longer scan while in OLED Mode.
- Now compatible with iPhone XR, iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, and the 2018 iPad Pro.
- Other various bug fixes and improvements.

Version 1.2.1 fixes an issue where the volume HUD would not show for some users.

Version 1.2.2 fixes an issue where tapping the volume icon would no longer switch modes.

Version 1.2.3 and 1.2.4 fix issues where the volume HUD would not show on iPad devices, and offer various other improvements for iPad users.

Version 1.2.8 adds full support for A12 devices.

Thanks for purchasing Ultrasound! I've been working hard to make the experience even better.

- Ultrasound is now free and [open source](https://github.com/aydenp/Ultrasound)! Bought it recently? Information about refunds for recent purchases [here](https://twitter.com/aydenpanhuyzen/status/1141309333810176005?s=21).
- Fix a crash experienced in OLED Mode on certain devices under heavy load.

Thanks for purchasing Ultrasound! I've been working hard to make the experience even better.

- You can now choose between three beautiful HUD themes: Dark, Light, and Extra Light.
- Tap the volume icon to quickly switch between adjusting your audio and ringer volume.
- Subtle Haptic Feedback when you hit 0% and 100% while adjusting volume.
- Face ID will no longer scan while in OLED Mode.
- The ringer switch now plays the system vibration as normal.
- Other various bug fixes and improvements.

Version 1.1.1 fixes some of the features introduced in an earlier update.
